about_the_game:
Description: In Outsanity, you awaken on unsettling confines of a building shrouded in mystery. With no memory of how you arrived, your only guide is the pulsing fear that tells you something is deeply wrong. This place is a labyrinth of secrets, and you must unearth the truth that lies buried within its walls.

Gameplay Features:
  • Explore: Navigate through the eerie corridors and rooms. Each step could be a clue or a trap.
  • Solve Puzzles: Engage with the environment to solve intricate puzzles that require more than just intellect; they demand courage.
  • Stealth Mechanics: Move silently, as the creatures lurking in the shadows have senses as sharp as their teeth. The sound of your footsteps or an interacted object can be your undoing.
  • Interact: Pick up objects that may aid in your escape or reveal the history of this place.
  • Survive: Stay out of sight and out of reach. Use hiding spots to evade the monsters that hunt you.

Story: Imprisoned in a structure that defies reason, you must piece together the fragments of your past and the building’s history. But beware, for the monsters are listening, and they are drawn to every sound you make. Will you uncover the truth and still sane?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on laptop with Intel Core i5-8250U CPU @1.6GHz, AMD Radeon 530 with low setting
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700K @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ultra Settings 4K with Intel i9-14900K, NVIDIA RTX 4090

short_description: Trapped in a mysterious place, you must uncover the truth. “Outsanity” offers a blend of stealth, puzzle-solving, and exploration. Tread lightly and solve the sparse enigmas to escape, but beware the monsters hear everything. Can you outwit these lurking creatures?
